name: Warm Firestorm
text: If you control a "Warm" monster, you can activate this card from your hand. Special Summon 3 "Warm" monsters from your Deck, and if you do, destroy all monsters on the field. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon as many "Warm" monsters from your GY as possible but those monsters cannot be used as Link material. You can only use one effect of "Warm Firestorm" per turn and only once that turn.
